item.title: Docs: Intel Robotics
item.description:
Intel RealSense

  • Intel RealSense SDK
  • Install on raspbian
  • Install on Raspberry Pi 3
  • Recommended configurations
  • Install LibRealSense on Jetosn Nano

Raspberry Pi

  • Intel® RealSense™ D400 cameras with Raspberry Pi

ROS

  • Integrating the Intel RealSense D435 with ROS
  • 3D Reconstruction using RTAB Map with Intel RealSense D435 RGB D Camera
    • Install RealSense SDK version 2.24
    • sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-ddynamic-reconfigure
    • Install LibRealSense on Jetosn Nano: sudo apt install ros-melodic-perception
    • Install LibRealSense on Jetosn Nano: sudo apt install ros-melodic-diagnostics
  • SLAM with RealSense D435i camera on ROS

Gazebo

  • Gazebo RealSense plugin
